str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.
A herald, preacher, proclaimer. From kerusso; a herald, i.e. Of divine truth.
From apostello; a delegate; specially, an ambassador of the Gospel; officially a commissioner of Christ.
A teacher, master. From didasko; an instructor.
